title: A White Cloak Turned is Still White (w/BryndenBFish)
description:
The rich parallels between Kingmaker Criston Cole and Kingbreaker Barristan Selmy! A look at both of their lives and roles in the Kingsguard and in the wars they fought. Both preferred swords over politics but were made Hand nonetheless. Does Cole's arc predicts Selmy's? Published March 26, 2020.

Jeff/NotaCast: https://notacastasoiaf.podbean.com/
